about.title: About the Artist
about.subtitle: Discover the story behind Scheve Schilder's unique artistic journey

story.title: My Story
story.paragraph1: Welcome to my artistic world! I'm Scheve Schilder, a passionate artist from the Netherlands. My journey began many years ago with a simple love for colors and the desire to capture the beauty I see in everyday moments.
story.paragraph2: Through my work, I aim to bring joy and inspiration to people's lives. Each piece tells a story, whether it's the golden light of a Dutch countryside morning or the vibrant energy of Amsterdam's bustling streets.

style.title: My Artistic Style
style.description: My work spans various mediums including oil paintings, watercolors, and mixed media. I'm particularly drawn to landscapes and urban scenes that capture the essence of Dutch life and culture. My style blends traditional techniques with contemporary vision, creating pieces that are both timeless and fresh.
